review: I'm very pleased with this set of screws! The variety and range of sizes are perfect for all my electronic repair needs. The quality is top-notch; they are well-made and durable, which is exactly what I look for in a product. The storage box is a great addition, making it easy to find the right screws without any hassle. For the price, this is an excellent value, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable screw set.
